languages.text: "Появление арбитров — добрый знак. Надеюсь, они помогут навести порядок на Райкаде".
languages.translation_comment: On Rykad Minoris, after meeting the Arbitrators.

traits.locale_text: "Появление арбитров — добрый знак. Надеюсь, они помогут навести порядок на Райкаде".

languages.text: "The Arbitrators' arrival was certainly a welcome sight. Hopefully they will help to put things back in order around here."
languages.translation_comment: On Rykad Minoris, after meeting the Arbitrators.
languages.original_text: "Появление арбитров — добрый знак. Надеюсь, они помогут навести порядок на Райкаде".

traits.locale_text: "The Arbitrators' arrival was certainly a welcome sight. Hopefully they will help to put things back in order around here."
"The Arbitrators' arrival was certainly a welcome sight. Hopefully they will help to put things back in order around here."
"The Arbitrators' arrival was certainly a welcome sight. Hopefully they will help to put things back in order around here."
"The Arbitrators' arrival was certainly a welcome sight. Hopefully they will help to put things back in order around here."
"The Arbitrators' arrival was certainly a welcome sight. Hopefully they will help to put things back in order around here."
"The Arbitrators' arrival was certainly a welcome sight. Hopefully they will help to put things back in order around here."

languages.text: 「アービトレイターたちの到着は、確かに喜ばしい光景でした。この辺りの秩序を取り戻す助けになってくださるとよいのですが」
languages.original_text: "The Arbitrators' arrival was certainly a welcome sight. Hopefully they will help to put things back in order around here."

traits.locale_text: 「アービトレイターたちの到着は、確かに喜ばしい光景でした。この辺りの秩序を取り戻す助けになってくださるとよいのですが」

languages.text: "Die Ankunft der Arbitratoren war ein willkommener Anblick. Hoffentlich helfen sie mit, hier wieder Ordnung einkehren zu lassen."
languages.original_text: "The Arbitrators' arrival was certainly a welcome sight. Hopefully they will help to put things back in order around here."

traits.locale_text: "Die Ankunft der Arbitratoren war ein willkommener Anblick. Hoffentlich helfen sie mit, hier wieder Ordnung einkehren zu lassen."

languages.text: « Je me réjouis de la venue des arbitrators. J'espère qu'ils pourront nous aider à rétablir l'ordre par ici. »
languages.original_text: "The Arbitrators' arrival was certainly a welcome sight. Hopefully they will help to put things back in order around here."

traits.locale_text: « Je me réjouis de la venue des arbitrators. J'espère qu'ils pourront nous aider à rétablir l'ordre par ici. »

languages.text: «La llegada de los Arbitrator fue sin duda bienvenida. Con suerte ayudarán a restablecer el orden por aquí».
languages.original_text: "The Arbitrators' arrival was certainly a welcome sight. Hopefully they will help to put things back in order around here."

traits.locale_text: «La llegada de los Arbitrator fue sin duda bienvenida. Con suerte ayudarán a restablecer el orden por aquí».

languages.text: “法务官的到来确实是件可喜的事情，我希望他们能协助恢复这里的秩序。”
languages.original_text: "The Arbitrators' arrival was certainly a welcome sight. Hopefully they will help to put things back in order around here."

traits.locale_text: “法务官的到来确实是件可喜的事情，我希望他们能协助恢复这里的秩序。”

languages.text: "Yargıcıları görmek içimi rahatlattı. Umarım burada işleri tekrar yoluna koymamıza yardımcı olurlar."
languages.original_text: "The Arbitrators' arrival was certainly a welcome sight. Hopefully they will help to put things back in order around here."

traits.locale_text: "Yargıcıları görmek içimi rahatlattı. Umarım burada işleri tekrar yoluna koymamıza yardımcı olurlar."
